desc: Takes a screenshot of the canvas (without the cursor), and returns it's imagedata.

args.name: x
args.desc: The top-left X coord of the area to take the screenshot of.

args.name: y
args.desc: The top-left Y coord of the area to take the screenshot of.

args.name: w
args.desc: The width of the area to take the screenshot of.

args.name: h
args.desc: The height of the area to take the screenshot of.
